meanings.definition: Skilled or experienced in a particular activity or profession.
meanings.sent1: She is a practiced pianist, playing beautifully at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The practiced surgeon performed the operation with precision.
meanings.sent3: The practiced chef could whip up a delicious meal in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her practiced hands swiftly solved the puzzle of the ancient artifact.
meanings.sent5: The practiced archer hit the bullseye every time with ease.

meanings.sent1: His practiced morning routine included a jog and a healthy breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The practiced schedule helped him stay organized and efficient.
meanings.sent3: She practiced her daily affirmations in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: The practiced habit of reading before bed helped him relax.
meanings.sent5: The practiced ritual of brewing coffee signaled the start of her day.
